name: vertilia/kit
description: Basic toolkit for professional web developer

suggest.ext-json: To allow for JSON response generation in JsonResponse class
suggest.ext-mbstring: To support multibyte handling in Nls class and values escaping in DbEntity class

suggest.ext-zlib: To handle blobs in Misc class
